  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item()
      Default constructor for the Item

    • Item

      public Item(String name, String image, int weight, int currentRoom, boolean pickable)
      Constructor for the Item
      Parameters:
      name - name of the item
      image - image of the item given as the name of the file in the src/main/resources folder
      weight - weight of the item
      currentRoom - current room of the item
      pickable - pickable state of the item
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the weight is less than 0 or the room is not between 0 and 9
